A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi Spoiler Review Star Wars the last Jedi is a nostalgia heavy joyride that doesn’t disappoint. The action sequences were beautiful\, the call backs to characters like Yoda and old themes coming back hit the spot and the packed with a bunch of interesting characters and plot points to bring attention back to the Star Wars franchise after the “alright Force Awakens”. 8/10
